item.title: docker学习笔记
item.description: 1.安装软件 docker安装mysql docker pull mysql docker run -p 3306:3306 --name mysql -v ~/mysql/data:/var/lib/mysql -e MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=123456 -d mysql: docker exec -i -t 3bb555abd8ab /bin/bash docker安装redis docker pull redis docker run -d --name redis -p 6379:6379 redis docker exec -i -t redis /bin/bash docker安装nginx docker pull nginx docker安装YAPI docker安装gogs 2.生产环境

item.title: linux操作手册2
item.description:
centos安装基础工具 yum install net-tools.x86_64 # ifconfig centos7安装docker https://www.cnblogs.com/yufeng218/p/8370670.html centos安装yapi https://www.jianshu.com/p/a97d2efb23c5 centos安装gogs https://www.jianshu.com/p/2a7acb07b352 linux远程ssh服务器 pem文件授权 chmod -R 400 *.pem 脚本代码 chmod -R 755 *.sh #/bin/bash #Verson:0.1 #Auther:lovelace #Pragram:This pragram is calculation your grade #import an argument echo -e ' [1 block1 ssh] 13.125.218.23 
 [11 block1 sftp] 13.125.218.23 
 [2 n1 ssh] 54.180.128.157 
 [22 n1 sftp] 54.180.128.157 
 [3 n3 ssh] 13.124.131.227 
 [33 n3 sftp] 13.
